member.name: T:ScintillaNET_Components.CharacterRange
member.summary: Specifies a range of characters. If the cpMin and cpMax members are equal, the range is empty. The range includes everything if cpMin is 0 and cpMax is –1.

member.name: F:ScintillaNET_Components.CharacterRange.cpMin
member.summary: Character position index immediately preceding the first character in the range.

member.name: F:ScintillaNET_Components.CharacterRange.cpMax
member.summary: Character position immediately following the last character in the range.

member.name: M:ScintillaNET_Components.CharacterRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies a range of characters. If the cpMin and cpMax members are equal, the range is empty. The range includes everything if cpMin is 0 and cpMax is –1.
member.param: The minimum, or start position.
The maximum, or end position.

member.name: M:ScintillaNET_Components.CharacterRange.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this to the given and returns an indication of their relative values.
member.param: to which this instance will be compared.
member.returns: -1 if this.cpMin is less than obj.cpMin or this.cpMax is less than obj.cpMax. 0 if equal this.cpMin is equal to obj.cpMin and this.cpMax is equal to obj.cpMax. 1 if this.cpMin is grater than obj.cpMin or this.cpMax is greater than obj.cpMax.

member.summary: Gets or sets the to be searched.

member.summary: Gets or sets the search direction. If true, the search is performed from the bottom up.

member.summary: Search for the first match in the text using the properties of this query object.

member.returns: where the result was found. will be the same as if no match was found.

member.name: M:ScintillaNET_Components.SearchTypes.Search.Replace(ScintillaNET.Scintilla,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search for the first match in the text using the properties of this query object. If it is already selected, replace it with the given string.
member.param: control to search.
String to replace any matches.
Set to true to allow the search to wrap back to the beginning of the text.
member.returns: where the result was found. will be the same as if no match was found.

member.summary: Replace all matches in the text with the given string, using the properties of this query object to search.

String to replace any matches.
member.returns: containing the locations of every match. Empty if none were found.

member.summary: Search for all matches in the text using the properties of this query object.

member.summary: Search for the next match in the text using the properties of this query object.

Replaces the next instance of the given query in the text.
object to use to perform the search. /// String to replace any matches. Can be a regular expression pattern. Set to true to allow the search to wrap back to the beginning of the text. where the result was found. will be the same as if no match was found.

member.name: M:ScintillaNET_Components.FindReplace.ReplaceAll(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces all instances of the given Regular Expression in the full body of the text with the given string.
member.param: for which to search.
String to replace any matches. Can be a regular expression pattern.
Set to true to use the configured margin marker to indicate the lines where matches were found.
Set to true to use the configured text indicator to highlight each match.
member.returns: containing the locations of every match. Empty if none were found.

member.summary: Replaces all instances of the given Regular Expression in the given range of the text with the given string.
member.param: in which to search.
for which to search.
String to replace any matches. Can be a regular expression pattern.
Set to true to use the configured margin marker to indicate the lines where matches were found.
Set to true to use the configured text indicator to highlight each match.
member.returns: containing the locations of every match. Empty if none were found.

member.param: object to use to perform the search.
